# Ambitious (Trait)
## Overview
**Ambitious**: You exude confidence in the presence of those more powerful than youâ€”sometimes unreasonably so. You gain a +4 trait bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks made to influence creatures with at least 5 Hit Dice more than you possess. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 59
